views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 8, 9 and 10

A tweak that adds some fun and useful features for the true Tinder power user.

Features:
* Auto-like (long press on the bottom of the cards view area to activate)
* Show user last active
* Toggle to show banner style matches
* Toggle to disable super like while swiping
* Tap profile photo in conversation list to show user profile
* Long press conversation/match cell to get an action sheet with options
* Never show a confirm alert for first like or dislike
* Only show “rate us” view once

Tap the unapologetically purple button added to the profile page to show settings.

* Fixed crashes appearing after the latest version * Removed the last active on card and profile options, since Tinder no longer supports displaying this information (and hasn't for a while) * Fixed long press on new matches not working
* Added toggle to hide the "Going out" view.
* Fixed settings icon not appearing on the new home view
* Changed auto-like to persist while loading new cards
* Fixed issue with scrolling in matches list for some users.

Please note that the reason "last active" says "2 years ago" is because that's currently what Tinder's server is returning for all users. There's unfortunately not much I can do about it right now.


Updated match cell long press and image tap to work with 7.3.0. This version is updated for Tinder 7.2.0. If you're running a lower version of Tinder, there's no need to update.

Also, the reason "last active" is showing "two years ago" is because Tinder's server is currently returning that date for each user. Let's hope it's only temporary!

* Removed features for the old style cards, which have been removed in the latest version
* Updated Auto-like to work with the latest version of Tinder
* Updated "auto-like", "show last active" and "banner style matches" to work with the new cards introduced in 7.0.1
* Added option to toggle between the new and old cards
* Updated show user profile from the matches list to work for version 7.0.0 of Tinder

* Fixed an app launch issue some people were experiencing after the latest version
* Fixed an issue where a user's distance was sometimes displayed incorrectly on their profile

* Added option to disable super like while swiping
* Auto-like and banner matches have been disabled for group cards due to some issues found
